pkgmetadata.longdescription: Faster Raster and Spatial Vector Processing Using 'GRASS' // Processing of large-in-memory/large-on disk rasters and spatial vectors using 'GRASS' https://grass.osgeo.org/. Most functions in the 'terra' package are recreated. Processing of medium- sized and smaller spatial objects will nearly always be faster using 'terra' or 'sf', but for large-in-memory/large-on-disk objects, 'fasterRaster' may be faster. To use most of the functions, you must have the stand-alone version (not the 'OSGeoW4' installer version) of 'GRASS' 8.0 or higher.
